body_text:
Having multiple toctrees at the root index.rst file makes ReadTheDocs' sidebar behave weirdly, like not nesting more than one level. This PR adds some index pages for each subfolder and makes the root index only have one toctree. The end result is a more useful sidebar and sane-er organization.
I also added api-tests.rst to the toctree; the builds have been complaining about it being missing for a while.

title: Reorganize documentation for better toctrees.
body:
Having multiple toctrees at the root `index.rst` file makes ReadTheDocs' sidebar behave weirdly, like not nesting more than one level. This PR adds some index pages for each subfolder and makes the root index only have one toctree. The end result is a more useful sidebar and sane-er organization.

I also added `api-tests.rst` to the toctree; the builds have been complaining about it being missing for a while.
